Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Generally, GenAI tends to be questioned more and its reputability uncertain. Trust is more easily leant to teachers

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback is much more personal and tailored (non-verbal cues can be read etc)
